channel.title: I Forgot
channel.description:
Well I haven't done a server in quite a while. So I got a source/client and whatever, but when I try to login it says error connecting to server. The port 43594 is forwarded, i changed so that it connected tot he correct ip, i ran the server, im not sure whats wrong.
EDIT: I put in localhost for the server ip and it loaded.
FIXED
